trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.
trans-unit.target: Generell transformasjonen støtte for 3D-objekter.

trans-unit.source: Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> methods, both of which return a GeneralTransform3D object.
trans-unit.target: Transformasjoner mellom 3D-objekter utføres via den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A>metoder, begge som returnerer et GeneralTransform3D-objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: I fall at transformeringen mellom 3D-objekter kan representert av en matrise 4 x 4 returnere metodene en forekomst av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: The GeneralTransform3D class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen GeneralTransform3D kan transformere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>til en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>og en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D>

trans-unit.source: GeneralTransform3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: GeneralTransform3D introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, kopierer denne metoden ressursen referanser og data bindinger (de ikke kan løse), men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Klone introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: CloneCurrentValue is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: CloneCurrentValue introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transformation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"></xref>, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Henter den inverse transformasjonen for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D"> </xref>, hvis mulig.

trans-unit.source: Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Inverse introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Motsatte av denne forekomsten, hvis det er mulig; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.IFormattable>grensesnittet.</xref:System.IFormattable> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: IFormattable.ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: IFormattable.ToString introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: Formatet til å bruke.

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) til å bruke standardformatet definert for typen for den <xref:System.IFormattable>implementeringen.</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: Leverandør som skal brukes til å formatere verdien.

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) til å hente tallformat informasjonen i gjeldende ID for nasjonal innstilling av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den gjeldende forekomsten i det angitte formatet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en strengrepresentasjon av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ToString introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this instance.
trans-unit.target: En strengrepresentasjon av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <xref:System.IFormatProvider> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en strengrepresentasjon av denne forekomsten, basert på den innsendte <xref:System.IFormatProvider>parameteren.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ToString introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IFormatProvider> instance used to process this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>forekomsten som brukes til å behandle denne forekomsten.</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den gjeldende forekomsten i det angitte formatet.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: Overfører angitte 3D punktet, og returnerer resultatet.

trans-unit.source: Transform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Transformering introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 3D punktet til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming point.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av transformere point .

trans-unit.source: The transform did not succeed.
trans-unit.target: Transformeringen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, overfører angitte 3D avgrensende boksen, og returnerer en akse justert 3D avgrensende, som er nøyaktig stort nok til den.

trans-unit.source: TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TransformBounds introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 3D avgrensende for å gjøre.

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
trans-unit.target: Minste akse justert 3D avgrensende boksen mulig som inneholder den transformerte rect .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, prøver å transformeringen angitte 3D punktet, og returnerer en verdi som angir om transformeringen var vellykket.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>metode, denne metoden ikke iverksette et unntak hvis transformeringen mislykkes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: TryTransform introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 3D punktet til transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming `inPoint`.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet av transformere `inPoint`.

trans-unit.source: if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis inPoint er transformert; ellers, .
